name: A Short Revolution
description:
:

The goverment has banned making games. This is outrageus!! You must protest by gathering followers and starting a revolution!!

Cops might block the way. Gather large sums of followers to intimidate them and get them to move.

Controls:

Move -> left joystick, wasd, arrows

Developers note:

This was my first time putting this much effort into sound which was a lot of fun! :D The audio in the browser version seems to be a bit messed up however, so if you want the full experience I would recommend downloading the game. I hope you enjoy! :)
